Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: Z790 GAMING PLUS WIFI


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Celeron / Intel Core 12th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 13th Gen (LGA 1700) / Pentium Gold


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z790


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 7200+(OC)/ 7000(OC)/ 6800(OC)/ 6600(OC)/ 6400(OC)/ 6200(OC)/ 6000(OC)/ 5800(OC)/ 5600(JEDEC)/ 5400(JEDEC)/ 5200(JEDEC)/ 5000(JEDEC)/ 4800(JEDEC)
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel
Memory Feature: Max. overclocking frequency:
- 1DPC 1R Max speed up to 7200+ MHz
- 1DPC 2R Max speed up to 6600+ MHz
- 2DPC 1R Max speed up to 6400+ MHz
- 2DPC 2R Max speed up to 5600+ MHz

Supports Intel XMP3.0 OC
Supports Dual-Controller Dual-Channel mode
Supports non-ECC, un-buffered memory


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: PCI_E1 slot (From CPU) Supports up to PCIe 5.0 x16
PCI Express 4.0 x16: PCI_E3 supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
PCI Express 3.0 x16: PCI_E4 supports up to PCIe 3.0 x1
PCI Express x1: PCI_E2 supports up to PCIe 3.0 x1


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 6 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: 2 x M.2 (Support PCIe 4.0 x4 & SATA) / 2 x M.2 (Support PCIe 4.0 x4)
SATA RAID: Supports RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5 and RAID 10 for SATA storage devices
Supports RAID 0, RAID 1, RAID 5 and RAID 10 for M.2 NVMe storage devices


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC897
Audio Channels: 7.1-Channel High Definition Audio


Onboard LAN
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Intel Wi-Fi 6E
The Wireless module is pre-installed in the M.2 (Key-E) slot
Supports MU-MIMO TX/RX, 2.4GHz / 5GHz / 6GHz* (160MHz) up to 2.4Gbps
Supports 802.11 a/ b/ g/ n/ ac/ ax
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.3
** Bluetooth 5.3 will be ready in Windows 10 build 21H1 and Windows 11.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1 x Keyboard / Mouse
1 x DisplayPort
3 x USB 2.0
1 x 2.5G LAN Port
1 x Wi-Fi / Bluetooth Antenna
6 x Audio Connectors
1 x Flash BIOS Button
1 x HDMI 2.1 Port
2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps Type-A
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 20Gbps Type-C
1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-A


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 4 x USB 2.0 ports
4 x USB 3.2 Gen1 Type A ports
1 x USB 3.2 Gen2 Type C ports
Other Connectors: 1 x CPU Fan
1 x Pump Fan
6 x System Fan
2 x Front Panel (JFP)
1 x Chassis Intrusion (JCI)
1 x Front Audio (JAUD)
1 x Tuning Controller connector (JDASH)
2 x Addressable V2 RGB LED connector (JARGB_V2)
2 x RGB LED connector (JRGB)
1 x TPM pin header (Support TPM 2.0)
1 x USB4 card connector (JTBT_U4_1, supports RTD3)


Software Feature
Windows 11: Supported


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: 4 x EZ Debug LED
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x Power Connector (ATX_PWR)
2 x Power Connector (CPU_PWR)
Label: Board MSI Z790 Gaming Plus Wifi
